description:
Spond is the best solution for organising sports teams, social groups and group activities. Join hundreds of thousands of members, coaches and parents using Spond every month to organise their groups. Spond is built to support both adult members and parents communicating on behalf of their children.

• Keep track of attendance for matches, trainings and other events
• Spond automatically send reminders to late responders
• Seamless integration with your calendar
• Attendance statistics
• Share information, pictures or updates with posts
• Create polls and let the members vote
• Request payments from members
• Send direct messages and create group chats
• Organise large teams into subgroups
• Support for parents communicating on behalf of their children.
• Import members from Excel, share group links or add members by email/SMS
• Batch create event or import matches from Excel
• Create repeating events for training
• Export participant lists to Excel
• The app is not required - members can receive information by email
• Free to download and use

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Team names and logos in this app are used solely for identification purposes. Neither the EPL nor any EPL club endorses or is associated with this application. 

By using this app, you agree to Apple’s standard End User License Agreement (EULA):
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

developer: Norges idrettsforbund og olympiske og paralympiske komite
description:
Min Håndball lar deg raskt og enkelt få tilgang til kamper, resultater og tabeller. Her kan du søke opp dine favorittlag, motta varsler om resultater og kampendringer og sjekke kalenderen for enkel og oversiktlig visning av det som er viktigst for deg, direkte på mobilen.
 
Har du en profil i Min idrett, kan du logge inn og automatisk få informasjon om lag tilknyttet deg og dine relasjoner, som spiller, lagleder eller trener. Som dommer vil du enkelt finne dine dommeroppdrag. Du vil også få muligheten til å registrere resultat direkte i appen. Enklere blir det ikke!
 
Funksjoner:
•             Søke opp og følge lag
•             Se spillere, kamper, tabeller og resultater for lag
•             Motta varsler om hendelser tilknyttet lagene du følger
•             Se kalender for når dine lag skal spille kamp
•             Se lag tilknyttet din Min idrett-profil
•             Se dine dommeroppdrag og registrere resultat
•             Se din lisenshistorikk og betale online
•             Eksportere og synkronisere kamper til telefonkalender
 
Det er fullt mulig å benytte Min Håndball uten å logge inn, men for optimal utnyttelse av funksjonaliteten i appen, anbefaler vi at du oppretter en bruker på http://minidrett.nif.no. Du kan selv opprette knytninger til dine barn og andre relasjoner, mens det er klubbene som har ansvaret for å vedlikeholde spillerstall og støtteapparat.

Direktesport er blitt enda bedre!

Vi har gitt Direktesport en forbedret brukeropplevelse med mengder av nytt og attraktivt sportsinnhold: Denne sesongen viser vi blant annet en rekke toppkamper fra Eliteserien og alt fra OBOS-ligaen og PostNord-ligaen. I tillegg byr vi på håndball, ishockey, friidrett, futsal, trav, bilsport, kampsport og en rekke andre idretter, både live og i opptak.

Direktesport er tilgjengelig på mobil, nettbrett, datamaskin i tillegg til app.

Har du tekniske spørsmål knyttet til innholdet, eller har du oppdaget en feil, ta kontakt med teknisk@direktesport.no. Har du spørsmål om innholdet eller hvordan du får tilgang, tar du kontakt med direktesport@amedia.no.

MATCHi - Connect with other players across the globe!

Download the app to find venues, book courts and explore memberships and activities. If your heart beats for padel, tennis, badminton, table tennis, pickleball or squash - welcome to be a part of our MATCHi community!

KEY FEATURES

- Book a court seamlessly
- Find venues and available times
- Simple overview of your favorite venues
- Filter by sport, date, time and court type
- Explore activities and memberships
- All the biggest racket sports
- Manage your bookings easily
- Invite your friends and split payments
- Multiple payment methods

HOW IT WORKS

1. Register/log into the app
2. Select the venue you want to find available courts, activities or memberships for
3. Select date, time and location
4. Choose payment method and book!

MORE ABOUT MATCHi

MATCHi exists to empower people in racket sports through user-friendly tech. With over 10 years of experience, we’ve found the perfect balance between user-friendly technology and powerful functionality. Regardless if your heart beats for padel, tennis, badminton, table tennis, pickleball or squash.

Can’t find the venue you search for? Tell your club manager about MATCHi and ask them to contact us!

developer: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

Trackman Golf is the one-stop-shop for all your Trackman activities. Better golf starts here.
 
The app gives you comprehensive access to all data registered during your indoor and outdoor Trackman activities, allowing you to analyze your practice and play performance and track your improvements, regardless of your golf skill level.
 
Enjoy the power of the Trackman tracking technology while using Trackman range, and access detailed data reports summarizing and providing insights on all your Trackman range, simulator and practice sessions.
 
Features include:
• Live ball-data tracking for Trackman range sessions (carry, total distance, ball speed, height, launch angle and more)
• Activity overview with insightful reports for all Trackman range, indoor and practice activities
• Games that will make you stay longer on the range and compete with friends
• Your personal Trackman account with lifetime statistics including your Trackman handicap
• Updated leaderboards across competitions
• Quick login to easily connect your Trackman personal profile and immediately start tracking your golf performance
• Available in different languages (currently English, Spanish, German, French, Chinese Japanese and Korean)
 
Download Trackman Golf to unleash your potential and make practicing or playing golf a more rewarding experience, whenever you want and wherever you are.

TV 2 Sporten is free to use from the Norwegian broadcaster and media company TV 2 and is your best friend for all sports related news in Norwegian - including all goals and live broadcasts* from TV 2s sport rights.

Watch all the goals from Champions League, Nations League and Norwegian leagues whenever you want, and all the Get-league goals are available for those of you following hockey. Dive into our live streams* for all matches that are available on TV 2 or TV 2 Sumo.

The app include Norwegian and international football, handball, hockey, cycling and wintersport. Find detailed info on the greatest clubs and national teams in the world. You will not need any other app to watch your team play on your device.

We want you to join us and interact through polls and competitions. There is also a chat function were you can ask questions to our experts and get close with videochat from the inner circle on the stadiums, add notification and we let you know when we are live.

If you cannot follow the match through the stream, add notification to a match or for your favourite team and get all match pushes.

See the schedule for your team and find where you can watch the game. The latest editorial news from TV 2 Sporten is always available in the news section.

We will continuously update the app with new features and are currently working on personalization with favourite team selection and more stats.  

Our Terms and Conditions:

https://sumo.tv2.no/tac/

*(requires subscription)

With Hoopit administration of your sports club is made easy. Every board, committee and team, as well as the individual players, parents and administrators are made accessible and manageable. Distribute information, create paid or unpaid events, or delegate tasks like carpooling! As a parent or player, we provide a solution to help you stay on top of your agenda, your expenses and information from your team or club!

Experience the ultimate indoor cycling companion with the MOWL® App:

- Explore 50,000+ rides from experts like Keiser, Wattbike, Body Bike, and more. Find your perfect workout with our user-friendly search filters.

- Stay on track with our workout player, offering real-time guidance in colour, heart rate, or power. No more guesswork; just peak performance.

- Seamlessly connect to your Bluetooth devices for in-app training tracking. Link your Spotify account for perfectly synchronised music that moves you.

- Build your fitness community – like, follow, and share your favourite creators' workouts.

- Unleash your creativity with "Open Goal" mode for freestyle sessions.

Best of all, our app is completely ad-free and without paywalls. It's indoor cycling made simple, fun, and efficient. Join us and press play on your ride to fitness success today!

Your real-time scores and stats app, fast and simple.

• As fast as a sports app can be. Get updates in real time with Live Activities on your Lock Screen or on match pages with odds, scores, play-by-play and more.
• Follow teams, leagues, divisions and tournaments, and personalise your home view in the app.
• Add a widget to your Home Screen to get quick access to scores and upcoming schedules.
• The best place to be a fan. Watch live matches on Apple TV or catch up on breaking stories with Apple News when you sync your sports.
• Includes Bundesliga, Bundesliga 2, Champions League, Conference League, EFL Championship, EFL Cup, Europa League, F1, FA Cup, FBS and FCS NCAA College Football, LaLiga, Leagues Cup, LIGA MX, Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Men’s College Basketball, Men’s Tennis, MLB, MLS, NASCAR, NBA, NFL, NHL, NWSL, Primeira Liga, Premier League, Segunda División, Serie A, Serie B, WNBA, Women’s Champions League, Women’s College Basketball and Women’s Tennis.

Requirements:
• Availability and features may vary by country, region or device.
• Apple Sports is free to use and is available for all iPhone models using iOS 17.2 or later.
• Features require internet access over a Wi-Fi or mobile data connection.

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

developer: Norges idrettsforbund og olympiske og paralympiske komite
description:
Denne appen skal være alt du trenger til din idrettshverdag! 

Hva du kan forvente:

- Se dine og dine barns lisenser, samt kjøpe nye
- Se oversikt over dine og dine barns medlemskap
- Få full oversikt over alle fakturaer og betalinger for deg selv eller dine barn
- Betale for både medlemskap og lisenser samt andre avgifter

Hva vi jobber videre med:

- Opprette ny bruker
- Hvordan du melder deg inn i en klubb
- Legge til familie og andre nære du vil administrere
- En enda mer brukervennlig app for deg som er på farten


Utforsk de fleste funksjonene som også er tilgjengelige på minidrett.no - nå i en mer brukervennlig app!
Gi tilbakemeldinger og hjelp oss med å prioritere videre utvikling
Vær en del av et engasjert fellesskap som brenner for idrett

Viktig å vite: Vi er tidlig ute med en app som vil ha noen skjønnhetsfeil. Vi setter stor pris på din tålmodighet og dine tilbakemeldinger mens vi jobber med å forbedre opplevelsen.

Last ned appen nå og bli med på reisen!

Våre Journalister gir deg de ferskeste sportsnyhetene og den beste kampdekningen. Oppdaterte sportsresultater, kommentarer og videoklipp gir deg følelsen av å være til stede når det skjer! Følg dine favorittlag og motta pushmeldinger ved viktige hendelser.

Vi dekker de viktigste ligaene innen fotball, hockey og håndball, samt Formel 1 og verdenscupen i langrenn og skiskyting.

Se video-høydepunkter, den viktigste statistikken, lagoppstillingen, mens du koser deg med artilkene våre på ett og samme sted. 

Har du innspill til hva vi kan gjøre bedre?

Send oss en e-post på sportsnext@schibsted.com. Vi setter stor pris på innspill fra deg!

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

Privacy policy: https://www.sofascore.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://www.sofascore.com/terms-and-conditions

PADEL MATES - The Ultimate Multi-Sport App for Racket Players! 

Download the app now and join the largest community of players in padel, pickleball, tennis, badminton, squash, and more! Discover players, matches, facilities, and easily book activities near you with PADEL MATES. 



KEY FEATURES: 

- Seamless Booking: Instantly book and pay for activities and courts within the app. 
- Discover Nearby Facilities: Explore a dynamic map to find nearby sports centers and facilities. 
- Community Groups: Create and manage community groups specifically for games and tournaments. 
- Game Finder: Easily locate games, tournaments, and training sessions at your preferred sports centers. 
- Smart Match Suggestions: Connect with players and receive personalized match suggestions based on your skill level and preferred center. 
- Organize with Ease: Effortlessly create and manage your own games and tournaments. 
- Trainer and Court Reservations: Reserve trainers or courts equipped with ball machines directly through the app. 
- Stay Connected: Chat with fellow padel mates and stay connected within the app.
- Cost Sharing Made Simple: Effortlessly split costs with friends for a hassle-free experience. 
- Performance Feedback: Receive valuable feedback on your game performance to improve your skills. 
- Secure Payments: Choose from multiple secure payment methods supported within the app. 


HOW TO USE: 

1. Register or log in to the app 
2. Set your game level and favorite sport facilities 
3. Discover new mates and book exciting activities! 

 
ABOUT PADEL MATES: 

Join the largest racket player community with PADEL MATES, the go-to app for seamless connections. Find like-minded players, enhance your skills, and enjoy an unmatched sporting experience. Spread the word to your club manager for easy booking through PADEL MATES! 



PADEL MATES subscription PRO Version.
PADEL MATES plans:
Monthly: $6
6 Month: $29
Annual: $49
Payments and Renewal:
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Account settings at any time after purchase
No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active period.


Terms of use: https://padelmates.se/en/privacy-policy-1
Privacy policy: https://padelmates.se/en/privacy-policy-1

MyGame er breddeplattformen for norsk lagidrett.
Ved hjelp av smarte sportkameraer produserer og strømmer vi breddekamper fra hele Norge.
Foreldre, familie, venner og fans kan følge deres favorittspillere og lag.
Tjenesten krever et abonnement.
Våre brukervilkår:
https://play.tv2.no/tac/
***
MyGame is the new streaming platform for Norwegian grassroots sports .
Utilizing intelligent sports cameras, MyGame will produce matches from all over Norway.
Parents, family, friends and fans can follow their favourite players and teams.
The service requires a subscription.
Our terms and conditions:
https://play.tv2.no/tac/

developer: International Ski and Snowboard Federation FIS
description: Calling all winter sports fans! The Official FIS App remains the #1 hub for Alpine Skiing, Cross‑Country, Ski Jumping, Freeski, Snowboard, Nordic Combined and more. Now you can dive deeper with Vertical Stories that highlight the best moments from our events, and a brand‑new Gaming Zone featuring an exciting fantasy game plus trivia quizzes. Tune into the latest happenings with FIS Live Radio and catch exclusive podcasts from athletes, experts and behind‑the‑scenes stories. Follow live races, view FIS TV highlights, check results and stats all in one place. Download now and immerse yourself in the world of winter sports like never before.

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries
•        Explore over 2000 hours of historic race archives
•        Enjoy a premium ad-free experience 

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

For help with F1TV, please visit: https://support.f1.tv/s/?language=en_US

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/f1-apps-terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

MinFotball is the Norwegian Football Federation’s app for everyone following Norwegian football. The app provides a complete overview: Here, you’ll find all Norwegian clubs, including all their teams. Follow your favorite teams in children's and youth leagues, as well as adult and top-level football.

ALWAYS UP TO DATE
MinFotball always has updated information on past and upcoming matches, along with league tables. The focus is on your team’s matches and standings, but you can also keep track of how other teams in the tournament are doing.

ALWAYS SYNCHRONIZED
MinFotball helps you stay on top of things! Once you’ve added the teams you follow, you can choose to receive notifications about match start times, changes, and results. You can even sync the matches directly to your calendar so you never miss a game!

FIND AWAY MATCHES
Finding your way to the next match has never been easier. MinFotball knows where every game is played and displays it on a map. Of course, you can also get directions.

HELP US IMPROVE THE APP
We’re always working to improve the app, and we need all the help we can get. If you experience any issues, send a message to support@nffsupport.no. If you have suggestions for new features, feel free to email us about that as well.

This app is a must for anyone interested in Norwegian football. Here, you’ll find matches, tables, and results for all levels.

PAY THE HIPPO - YOUR TEAM'S DIGITAL FINE BOX

Pay The Hippo is your team's digital fine box for managing and assigning fines to each other to save up money for your next big event. 
Whether you are part of a sports team or a study group Pay The Hippo can be used to better give your comrades an overview of who owes what. 

Enjoy!
The Pay The Hippo team

Game schedule, results and tables for tournaments. Includes results registration.
 
Profixio provides all matches with results and tables for all tournaments where Profixio is used.
 
Profixio provides real-time overview of the results and tables tournament you follow.
 
Add your favorite teams, and get updates when there are new results. 

See an overview of the matches that have just finished, or select matches for a category.
 
For organizers we recommend this app to register match results.
Tables and teams into playoff calculated immediately, thereby providing followers an immediate overview.
 
The name of the company that owns the app is Profixio Norway.
With the SNØ app, you get access to wardrobes and the snow zone directly on your mobile. We look forward to seeing you at SNØ!

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

developer: Norges idrettsforbund og olympiske og paralympiske komite
description:
Min Hockey lar deg raskt og enkelt få tilgang til kamper, resultater og tabeller. Her kan du søke opp dine favorittlag, motta varsler om resultater og kampendringer og sjekke kalenderen for enkel og oversiktlig visning av det som er viktigst for deg, direkte på mobilen.

Har du en profil i Min idrett, kan du logge inn og automatisk få informasjon om lag tilknyttet deg og dine relasjoner, som spiller, lagleder eller trener. Som dommer vil du enkelt finne dine dommeroppdrag. Du vil også få muligheten til å registrere resultat direkte i appen. Enklere blir det ikke!

Funksjoner:
•	Søke opp og følge lag
•	Se spillere, kamper, tabeller og resultater for lag
•	Motta varsler om hendelser tilknyttet lagene du følger
•	Se kalender for når dine lag skal spille kamp
•	Se lag tilknyttet din Min idrett-profil
•	Se dine dommeroppdrag og registrere resultat
•	Se din lisenshistorikk og betale online
•	Signere line sheet/game sheet
•	Mulighet å kunne synkronisere kamper en har i app'ens kalender med telefonkalender

Det er fullt mulig å benytte Min Hockey uten å logge inn, men for optimal utnyttelse av funksjonaliteten i appen, anbefaler vi at du oppretter en bruker på http://minidrett.nif.no. Du kan selv opprette knytninger til dine barn og andre relasjoner, mens det er klubbene som har ansvaret for å vedlikeholde spillerstall og støtteapparat.
